sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {go, stop} from '../actions'; const Controller = ({dispatch, intersection}) => { const handleGo = (e) => { const direction = e.target.innerHTML const payload = {} payload[direction] = 'green' dispatch(go(payload)) } const handleStop = (e) => { const direction = e.target.innerHTML const payload = {} payload[direction] = 'red' if(direction === 'north' || direction === 'south'){ payload = { north: 'green', south: 'green', east: 'red', west: 'red', } } dispatch(stop(payload)) } return (

N: {intersection.north}

E: {intersection.east}

S: {intersection.south}

W: {intersection.west}

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({intersection: state.intersection}) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Controller)
